sentences.sContent: He has lived in Canada for more than twenty years and is completely Canadianized now.
sentences.sCn: 他在加拿大已经住了二十多年了，现在完全加拿大化了。

sentences.sContent: ...Researchers in Canada just published a study in the journal Psychological Science that says trying to get people to think more positively can actually have the opposite effect: it can simply highlight how unhappy they are...

trans.tranOther: a nation in northern North America
